text:
Setup the Authorization manager with Right user ID,Password and Base URL.
Try a HTTP request with that needs the Authorization. JMeter fails to submit the
right request.

Error in the response
Thread Name: Thread Group 1-1
Sample Start: Thu Oct 12 13:59:31 CDT 2006
Load time: 16
HTTP response code: 401
HTTP response message: Unauthorized

Talk to Red Hat Linux, Tomcat 5.5.9 Java 1.5
JMeter running on Windows XP
Expected result You should be Authorized and Page content should be seen in
response.
creator: gyanapalam-bugzilla@yahoo.com

text: Need more detail, because this works for others
